title: (45001) Toledo - 5 Calle Miguel de Cervantes
description: Laundry center Toledo. Self-service laundry, has washing machines with a capacity of 13 and 17 kilos (36 minutes) and dryers with a capacity of 19 kilos 20 minutes. Wash and dry, in cash, bills and coins, , with the possibility of paying with your mobile phone by downloading the application available in the Play Store. It has an automatic store open 24 hours

title: (45001) Toledo - 6 Cuesta de los Capuchinos
description: A great spot to park your van during the day directly in the centre. 1st floor up to 2.3m. 2nd floor solely 1.75m. A very helpful guy guided us the way into the parking spot. Perfect and safe place to park your car for a short visit in Toledo.

title: (45006) Toledo - Ronda de Juanelo
description: Small parking although this may be suitable for some campers. Ideal for vans. Excellent view of the city and near the bridge that gives access to escalators. No toilets or showers but there is a footbridge that leads to another car park. Very calm and quiet

title: (45006) Toledo - 1A Paseo de la Rosa

Camping forbidden road sign

title: (45003) Toledo - 3 Avenida Castilla la Mancha

title: (45003) Toledo - 3A Paseo Merchán
description: Just a few parking spots in line but since it is a paid parking lot you may get a place. It is very cheap! And is tight by the entrance of Toledo.

a little sloping but if you go to the parking lot and go up two side ones you are almost straight.

title: () -

title: (45789) Turleque -

title: (45789) Caserío Venta Vieja -
description:
Not so difficult to access through sand roads. ok for bigger vans.

the spot is very calm, 100% nature. it's beautiful as well. But! 

it's a little dirty... we gathered 4 big trash bags in a 50m radius and were happy to clean the nature a little.

come with your kids and teach them to clean natural spots!

nasty bits appart, it's beautiful and calm and in the middle of nowhere, I'll come again to clean a different spot:)

title: (45789) Turleque -

title: (45780) Tembleque - Unnamed Road

title: (45165) San Martín de Montalbán -

title: (28300) Aranjuez - 22 Calle de la Reina
description: Dirt parking next to the entrance of the Parque del Príncipe. There is parking on both sides of the road. Quiet place at night. During the day some cars come to visit the park. It is next to the road but not many cars pass by at night.

title: (45300) Ocaña -
description: This is not a beautiful place but it's got a huge tree with lots of shade that any size vehicle can fit under easily! we just stopped here for lunch, very near autovia, 200m or so. we here on a Sunday so very quiet

title: (28991) Torrejón de la Calzada - 12 Calle Ribera
title_short: (28991) Torrejón de la Calzada - 12 Calle Ribera
description: Open area in the middle of a small pine forest, across the street there is a pine park closed with benches and tables. Near a Mercadona and the exit of the town. Direct buses to Madrid (Plaza eliptica) and to Parla (Renfe with stop at Puerta del Sol)

title: (28607) El Álamo - 7 Poligono Sau
description: Recreational area "San Isidro Labrador" shaded ground parking. Some areas are level and others are not. Picnic areas Children's play area, water and garbage cans.

title: (28971) Griñón - 151A Paseo del Carraperal
description: I live next to this place and I see Cars heading to this point and they have to turn around. The place is very bad, if you have no choice in any part of the town as there is a wide street, I would spend the night, now traveling here thinking that it is a good place, I do not recommend it.

title: (28991) Torrejón de la Calzada - 7 Calle la Iglesia
title_short: (28991) Torrejón de la Calzada - 7 Calle la Iglesia

title_short: (28990) Torrejón de Velasco - 15 Calle Presidente Calvo Sotelo
description: Quiet open space, near the road, at night the noise of the cars does not bother. Bar next door and pharmacy on the same street. Other shops no more than 5 minutes walk. Cemetery nearby, gas station draining water towards Valdemoro. Use for collecting school children, try not to reach the entrance or exit of the school.

title: (45540) Erustes - CM-4015

title: (28990) Torrejón de Velasco - Unnamed Road

title: (28990) Torrejón de Velasco - Pk 31 M-404

title_short: (45120) San Pablo de los Montes - 57 Calle Convento

In the town there are all the services that may be needed.

title: (28939) Arroyomolinos - Unnamed Road

title: (28983) Parla - 42 Avenida de los Planetas
description: Completely flat parking next to a gym with multiple services and a complete supermarket. Artisan bakery of bread and more, butcher shop, greengrocers, pizzerias and kebabs. Very quiet both day and night. Children's playgrounds and a large park with green areas nearby. Tram 2 min away with a connection in 10 min to the Madrid renfe commuter train without transfer. Quiet and safe area (AC parked all year), away from noise. Possible access to gym and supermarket toilet. Suitable for all types of vehicle sizes.

title: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 18 Camino la Dehesa
title_short: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 18 Camino la Dehesa
description: Parking next to the sports courts. Very wide, quite level. The noise from the power station is barely audible. The road at night is little traveled. The parking lot lights stay on.

title: (28342) Valdemoro - 28M Calle Rosalia de Castro
description: Filling with water (not drinkable).

title: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 1E Arroyo Caño
description:
Aparcamiento gratuito en vía pública. Los aparcamientos no son muy amplios, por lo que es más para furgonetas pequeñas/medianas que para autocaravanas o Camper de grandes dimensiones.
Al lado está el centro de Salud, hay un restaurante y un supermercado.
Tranquilo para pasar la noche. Aunque por la mañana hay trasiego de coches.

title: (45910) - Avenida Villa de Peñafiel
description: Secondary unpaved road that runs along the river bank, quiet, little traveled. Right next to a stone bridge with abundant trees that provide shade.

title: (28939) Arroyomolinos - 31 Calle Madrid
description: A quiet place next to the sports center, overnight without any problem. Next door there is a civil guard barracks.

title_short: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de los Siete Picos

title_short: (28350) Ciempozuelos - 11 Camino de la Cuesta Alta

title: () Parla -

description: Laundry next to a Mercadona, quite well located

description: Parking of the bullring, quite flat, very central, 5 min to the town square. It has a park next door, 4 restaurants, the medical center opposite, a laundry and a motorhome workshop.

title: (45910) Escalona del Alberche - 44 Avenida Constitución
description: Parking of the Sports Center, swimming pools with bathrooms and showers. Well lit and 5 m from the town walking.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 1 Diseminado Camino Agua Riaza
description: Prairie of San Isidro, meadow with small trees and small shadows, is usually quiet but can coincide with some celebration, since there are swings, barbecue area and fountains. Discard coming in the week of San Isidro (May 15) there is a fair all week and it is impossible to park

title_short: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 4 Avenida de las Flores

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - Unnamed road
description: Quiet place next to institute

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 21 Calle de los Cástines
description: Great place to park and rest. It is just a short walk to the historic center. Quiet, spacious, and well-kept parking area. It has a 24 hour gas station right next door. And also a supermarket. Not many cars usually pass by and it allows you to rest well.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
title_short: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
description: A simple parking lot in the middle of the houses. You hear street noise. There are no services, but the place seems safe even if it is absolutely charmless. It's certainly not a place to spend the day, but for an overnight stop if you arrive late, it's fine.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 25 Autovía del Suroeste
description: Service area in Navalcarnero with ample parking, its own exit from the A-5 motorway, there is also a hotel called Las Vegas.

title_short: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 6 Avenida de la Industria

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 51 Calle de las Suertes
description: Two areas with picnic tables around a children's play area. It has a drinking water source and you can park well.

title: (28939) Arroyomolinos - 7 Calle Puerto de Navacerrada
description: Repsol gas station, next to the Xanadú shopping center, friendly and attentive staff, the rest is somewhat noisy due to the location, right next to a McDonald's

description: Area with some flat places along the road, where you can park to visit Fuenlabrada.

title: (28942) Fuenlabrada - s/n Paseo Loranca
description: Large parking space with no facilities next to the agricultural park. Busy during the day and larger street nearby. It is not a very nice place but ok if you need to spend a night in this area.

title: (28938) Móstoles - Calle de la Osa Mayor
title_short: (28938) Móstoles - Calle de la Osa Mayor

title: (28942) Fuenlabrada - calle de la Igualdad
description: Parking and sleeping area is a very quiet and wooded dormitory neighborhood with no problem to spend the night there is a large park that has a public fountain inside and outside there is a dog area in front of it there is a shopping center with public toilets, shops and Alcampo with a gas station about 500m in a square there is a laundry

title: (28946) Madrid - s/n Camino de la Vega
title_short: (28946) Madrid - s/n Camino de la Vega
description: If you need to make a stop on the way to TOLEDO, it is a good place, always leaving it as it is. A few meters gas station and municipal swimming pool. La Pollina recreational area, with excellent 3 game parks for the little ones. Picnic areas, soccer field and basketball. Free public toilets. Very flat area, with no slope or height, width or length limitations.

title: (28938) Móstoles - 9001A Calle Andrómeda
description: Quiet place to spend the night, with little traffic and easy access, there are 6 spacious spaces that can fit a 7.5m AC. There are many bars and restaurants nearby and a metro stop and an Aldi supermarket 100 meters away.

title: (28941) Fuenlabrada - Calle de Zaragoza
description: Parking next to Renfe train station, quiet night, you hear trains.

title: (28620) - 14A Carretera de Mentrida
